Name: Statue of Talos
Damage Resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
Traits: False Appearance. While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.
Actions: Multiattack. The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades. Headbutt. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. Lightning Bolt Blades. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.
